title: Domestic Democrats ' Strike for the Implementation of Islamic Shari ' a
subtitle: Untrustful sources of news have reported that Democrats have tried to implement sharia law in the United States through legislation condemning violence and hate speech against Muslims.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The Democrats in Congress tried to implement the Shariah by issuing House of Representatives Resolution No. 569, a condemnation of violence and intolerance against Muslims.
